Subject: Re: ENTER GROUNDED!!!
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider tries to swerve up and around dodging the gun blasts. "Dammit" he
yells, but there are to many. They nick and graze him, puncturing small
holes where they hit, and he soars upwards to get away. He wasnt stupid,
even though he acted it. He was outnumbered, and needed to keep it a one on
one fight for now.
